Package org.ginsim.core.graph.view

Interface NodeViewInfo

  • public interface NodeViewInfo
    Store for basic view information on nodes. This interface defines the mandatory information on nodes. Each node must have a position (x,y) and a style (can be null).
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      NodeStyle getStyle()
      Get the style used to draw this node.
      int getX()
      Get the position of the node on the x axis
      int getY()
      Get the position of the node on the y axis
      boolean setPosition​(int x, int y)
      Set the position of this node.
      boolean setStyle​(NodeStyle style)
      Set the style to use for this node.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        int getX()
        Get the position of the node on the x axis
        Returns:

      • getY

        int getY()
        Get the position of the node on the y axis
        Returns:
        the position on the y axis

      • getStyle

        NodeStyle getStyle()
        Get the style used to draw this node. If
        Returns:
        the style for this node, or null to use the default.

      • setStyle

        boolean setStyle​(NodeStyle style)
        Set the style to use for this node.
        Parameters:
        style - the new style
        Returns:
        true if the style was updated

      • setPosition

        boolean setPosition​(int x,
                    int y)
        Set the position of this node. Note that negative positions are not accepted.
        Parameters:
        x - the new x value
        y - the new y value
        Returns:
        true if the position was updated.
